entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9 except minus 17 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy except clear north of Terrenceville overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 9 except minus 17 north of Terrenceville. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain in the evening then to rain or drizzle after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
